Name: minimize_total_effort
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort of all tasks in the active sprint backlog.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of the team to improve throughput.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the maximum severity of any active blocker in the sprint.

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the total priority score of features included in the release plan.

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Minimize the duration of sprints to increase feedback frequency.

Name: maximize_skill_match
Description: Maximize the alignment between task requirements and worker skills.

Name: minimize_budget_deviation
Description: Minimize the deviation of the actual spend from the project budget.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the satisfaction level of stakeholders from the sprint review.

Name: minimize_context_switching
Description: Minimize the number of different story types a single worker is assigned to.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate of successfully achieved sprint goals.
